alert.note: Alert for Northern Campbell; Southern Campbell; Weston (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Campbell and southwestern Weston Counties through 645 PM MDT... At 600 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 12 miles north of Savageton to 11 miles northeast of Wright to 7 miles northeast of Dull Center. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Morrisey. This includes Interstate 90 in Wyoming near Mile Marker 104, and between Mile Markers 109 and 120. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
